name: BossTalk
0:
”Alexa, open boss talk”
”Alexa, start boss talk”
”Alexa, launch boss talk”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: boss talk
Developer Terms of Use
des:
We've all had that boss who drops into our day to share empty corporate talk. 

Now you can experience the joys of middle management and corporate jargon from the comfort of your own home. 

Invoke this skill and you'll hear from an experienced manager who drops in to say nothing at all and leaves the conversation just as quickly. 

Designed and built by Nicolle Merrill, author of the career book, Punch Doubt in the Face: How to Upskill, Change Careers, and Beat the Robots
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
